subject: Soccer
World Cup (Soccer)
lead_paragraph: Jérôme Valcke, the secretary general of FIFA, on Wednesday dismissed allegations of wrongdoing over $10 million in bank transactions at a news conference in Samara, Russia.
snippet: Jérôme Valcke, the secretary general of FIFA, on Wednesday dismissed allegations of wrongdoing over $10 million in bank transactions at a news conference in Samara, Russia.
